mapper.select: select sum(tt.order_price) as sales, (to_date(to_char(order_date,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYYMMDD') - to_date('19700101','yyyymmdd')) * (1*24*60*60*1000) as order_date from (select distinct order_id, order_price, order_date from( select *from meeting_order where order_flag =1 ))tt group by (to_date(to_char(order_date,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYYMMDD') - to_date('19700101','yyyymmdd')) * (1*24*60*60*1000) order by order_date
